metadata.dc:author: Matusevich, Daniel
metadata.dc:description: The purpose of this paper is to describe and analyze the development of the psychiatry at the nursing homes. We explore both the historic and epistemological aspects of the question and focus in the epidemiology, the psychiatric diagnosis (dementia, Depression And SAG.), the psychiatric medication and the controversial problem of the physical restraint.
metadata.dc:title: La psicogeriatría en las instituciones geriátricas: una tierra de oportunidades.
[Geriatric psychiatry in the nursing home: a land of opportunity].
